title: ipi-platform
description: This module defines a data model for representing a system    component inventory, which can include hardware or software    elements arranged in an arbitrary structure. The primary    relationship supported by the model is containment, e.g.,    components containing subcomponents.

ipi-platform:components.description: Enclosing container for the components in the system.

component.description: List of components, keyed by component name.

state.description: Operational state data for each component

type.description: Type of component as identified by the system

location.description: System-supplied description of the location of the component within the system. This could be a bay position, slot number, socket location, etc. For component types that have an explicit slot-id attribute, such as linecards, the system should populate the more specific slot-id.

mfg-name.description: System-supplied identifier for the manufacturer of the component.This data is particularly useful when a component manufacturer is different than the overall device vendor.

mfg-date.description: System-supplied representation of the component's manufacturing date.

hardware-version.description: For hardware components, this is the hardware revision of the component.

firmware-version.description: For hardware components, this is the version of associated firmware that is running on the component, if applicable.

software-version.description: For software components such as operating system or other software module,this is the version of the currently running software.

serial-no.description: System-assigned serial number of the component.

part-no.description: System-assigned part number for the component.This should be present in particular if the component is also an FRU(field replaceable unit).

removable.description: If true,this component is removable or is a field replaceable unit

oper-status.description: If applicable,this reports the current operational status of the component.

parent.description: Reference to the name of the parent component.

empty.description: If true indicates that a component position (slot) is not populated

memory.description: For components that have associated memory, these values    report information about available and utilized memory

available.description: The available memory physically installed, or logically allocated to the component.

board-fru.description: For components that have associated board fru details

min.description: The minimum value of the statistic over the sampling period.

max.description: The maximum value of the statistic over the sampling period.

avg.description: The arithmetic mean value of the statistic over the sampling period.

interval.description: This reports the time interval over which the min/max/average statistics are computed by the system.

sensor-name.description: The name of the temperature sensor in the system.

sensor-index.description: The index of the temperature sensor in the system.

alarm-status.description: A value of true indicates the alarm has been raised or asserted. The value should be false when the alarm is cleared.

alarm-threshold.description: The threshold value that was crossed for this alarm.

alarm-severity.description: The severity of the current alarm.

minimum-emergency-temperature.description: The minimum temperature threshold for emergency alarm.

maximum-emergency-temperature.description: The maximum temperature threshold for emergency alarm.

minimum-alert-temperature.description: The minimum temperature threshold for alert alarm.

maximum-alert-temperature.description: The maximum temperature threshold for alert alarm.

minimum-critical-temperature.description: The minimum temperature threshold for critical alarm.

maximum-critical-temperature.description: The maximum temperature threshold for critical alarm.

equipment-failure.description: If trueCOMMA the hardware indicates that the component's physical equipment

state.description: Operational data for bmc-sensor

value.description: sensor record value.Value -100002 represents not applicable

lower-non-recoverable.description: lower non recoverable sensor threshold.-100002 represents not applicable

lower-non-critical.description: lower non critical sensor threshold.-100002 represents not applicable

lower-critical.description: lower non critical sensor threshold.-100002 represents not applicable

upper-non-critical.description: upper non critical sensor threshold.-100002 represents not applicable

upper-critical.description: upper critical sensor threshold.-100002 represents not applicable

upper-non-recoverable.description: upper critical sensor threshold.-100002 represents not applicable

event-type.description: Type of event for sensor notification

state.description: Operational state data for the subcomponent

subcomponent-name.description: Reference to the name of the subcomponent

state.description: Operational state data for CPU components

processor-count.description: Number of processors currently available in the system

cpu-1min-load-percentage.description: The arithmetic mean value of the percentage measure of the CPU load over 1 minute interval

cpu-5min-load-percentage.description: The arithmetic mean value of the percentage measure of the CPU load over 5 minutes interval

cpu-15min-load-percentage.description: The arithmetic mean value of the percentage measure of the CPU load over 15 minutes interval

cpu-1min-alert-threshold.description: CPU load threshold during 1 minute interval for alert level

cpu-1min-critical-threshold.description: CPU load threshold during 1 minute interval for critical level

cpu-5min-alert-threshold.description: CPU load threshold during 5 minutes interval for alert level

cpu-15min-alert-threshold.description: CPU load threshold during 15 minutes interval for alert level

cpu-utilization-alert.description: Instantaneous CPU load threshold for alert level

cpu-utilization-critical.description: Instantaneous CPU load threshold for critical level

state.description: Operational state data for storage component

unformatted-bytes-or-track.description: Hard disk's unformatted bytes or track.

unformatted-bytes-or-sector.description: Hard disk's unformatted bytes or sector.

revision-number.description: Hard disk's Revision number. Blank indicates unavailable

total-memory.description: Total memory of the Hard storage.

used-memory.description: Used memory of the Hard storage.

free-memory.description: Free memory of the Hard storage.

usage-critical-threshold.description: Hard disk's usage threshold % for critical level.

usage-alert-threshold.description: Hard disk's usage threshold % for Alert Level.

remain-life-critical-threshold.description: Hard disk's Remain Life threshold % for Critical Level.

remain-life-alert-threshold.description: Hard disk's Remain Life threshold % for Alert Level.

available-reserved-space.description: Hard disk's Available Reserved Space % values

available-reserved-space-critical-thresh.description: Hard disk's Available Reserved Space threshold % values for critical Level.

available-reserved-space-alert-threshold.description: Hard disk's Available Reserved Space threshold % values for Alert Level.

reallocated-sector-count.description: Hard disk's Reallocated Sectors Count values.

manufacturer-id.description: Hard disk's manufacturer identification defined by JEDEC.

device-type.description: Hard disk's type. Removable or Embedded.

harddisk-monitoring.description: Container for hard disk monitoring state information

state.description: Operational state data for hard disk monitoring

interval.description: Hard disk's activity monitoring interval in seconds.

read-average.description: Hard disk's average read activity in KBps.

write-average.description: Hard disk's average write activity in KBps.

read-current.description: Hard disk's current read activity in KBps.

write-current.description: Hard disk's current write activity in KBps.

read-threshold.description: Hard disk's read activity threshold in KBps.

write-threshold.description: Hard disk's write activity threshold in KBps.

mounted-filesystems.description: Container for mounted filesystem state information

mounted-filesystem.description: List to store operational data related to mounted filesystems

mount-point.description: A unique value for each mounted filesystem.

state.description: Operational state data for mounted filesystem

total.description: Total memory of the mounted filesystem.

used.description: Used memory of the mounted filesystem.

free.description: Free memory of the mounted filesystem.

state.description: Operational state data for ram components

total-memory.description: CPU RAM's total free memory available for utilisation in MBytes.

used-memory.description: CPU RAM's used memory available for utilisation in MBytes.

available-memory.description: CPU RAM's available memory for utilisation in MBytes.

shared-memory.description: CPU RAM's shared memory available for utilisation in MBytes.

buffers.description: CPU RAM's bufffer available for utilisation in MBytes.

total-swap.description: CPU RAM's total swap memory available for utilisation in MBytes.

free-swap.description: CPU RAM's free swap memory available for utilisation in MBytes.

current-process-count.description: Number of processes currently running in RAM.

total-high-memory.description: CPU RAM's total High memory in MBytes.

available-high-memory.description: CPU RAM's available high memory in MBytes.

unit-size.description: CPU RAM's memory unit size in Bytes.

usage-critical-threshold.description: RAM usage threshold % for critical level.

usage-alert-threshold.description: RAM usage threshold % for alert level.

state.description: Operational state data for transceiver components

channel-count.description: Number of channels available for this transceiver.

transceiver-identifier.description: The Type of transceiver present eg:SFP/SFP+/SFP28/QSFP/QSFP+/QSFP28.

extended-ethernet-compliance-code.description: Bitmap of Extended Ethernet Compliance codes. null indicates unavailable.

sonet-compliance-code.description: Sonet Compliance codes of transceiver. null indicates unavailable.

serial-encoding-algorithm.description: Code for SFP/QSFP high speed serial encoding algorithm

link-length-kilometer.description: Link length supported for single mode fiber, units of km.

link-length-meter.description: Link length supported for single mode fiber, units of 100 m.

om1-link-length.description: Link length supported for 62.5 um OM1 fiber, units of 10 m.

om2-link-length.description: Link length supported for 50 um OM2 fiber, units of 10 m.

om3-link-length.description: Link length supported for 50 um OM3 fiber, units of 10 m.

om4-link-length.description: Link length supported for 50 um OM4 fiber, units of 10 m.

vendor-part-number.description: Part number provided by transceiver vendor.

vendor-revision-number.description: Revision level for part number provided by vendor.

check-code.description: Check code for Base ID Fields.

extended-check-code.description: Check code for the Extended ID Fields.

maximum-signalling-rate.description: Upper bit rate margin, units of 1% above the Nominal Bit Rate.

minimum-signalling-rate.description: Lower bit rate margin, units of 1% below the Nominal Bit Rate.

ddm-type.description: Indicates which type of diagnostic monitoring is implemented.

frequency-error-critical-min-threshold.description: The minimum critical threshold for transceiver frequency-error

frequency-error-critical-max-threshold.description: The maximum critical threshold for transceiver frequency-error

frequency-error-alert-min-threshold.description: The minimum alert threshold for transceiver frequency-error

frequency-error-alert-max-threshold.description: The maximum alert threshold for transceiver frequency-error

wavelength-error-critical-min-threshold.description: The minimum critical threshold for transceiver wavelength-error

wavelength-error-critical-max-threshold.description: The maximum critical threshold for transceiver wavelength-error

wavelength-error-alert-min-threshold.description: The minimum alert threshold for transceiver wavelength-error

wavelength-error-alert-max-threshold.description: The maximum alert threshold for transceiver wavelength-error

transceiver-temperature.description: Internally measured Temperature in Channel of transceiver.

temperature-alert-max-threshold.description: The maximum temperature alert threshold in Channel of transceiver.

temperature-critical-max-threshold.description: The maximum temperature critical threshold in Channel of transceiver.

temperature-critical-min-threshold.description: The minimum temperature critical threshold in Channel of transceiver.

temperature-alert-min-threshold.description: The minimum temperature alert threshold in Channel of transceiver.

transceiver-voltage.description: Measured Voltage in Channel of transceiver.

voltage-alert-max-threshold.description: The maximum voltage alert threshold in Channel of transceiver.

voltage-critical-max-threshold.description: The maximum voltage critical threshold in Channel of transceiver.

voltage-critical-min-threshold.description: The minimum voltage critical threshold in Channel of transceiver.

voltage-alert-min-threshold.description: The minimum voltage alert threshold in Channel of transceiver.

sfp-identifier.description: Extended identifier of SFP transceiver for additional information.

sfp-options-implemented.description: Transceiver Options Implemented for SFP Transceiver.

xsfp-identifier.description: Extended identifier of XFP transceiver for additional information.

xfp-10g-ethernet-compliance-code.description: 10G ethernet compliance codes of XFP transceiver.

xfp-10g-fiber-channel-compliance-code.description: 10G fiber channel compliance codes of XFP transceiver.

xfp-sonet-interconnect-compliance-code.description: SONET/SDH interconnect codes of XFP transceiver.

state.description: Operational state data for qsfp type transceivers

qsfp-identifier.description: Extended identifier of QSFP transceiver for additional information.

qsfp-options-implemented.description: Transceiver Options Implemented for QSFP Transceiver.

channel.description: List to store operational data related to transceiver channels

index.description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each channel in the transceiver within the unit.

state.description: Operational state data for transceiver channel index

index.description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each channel in the transceiver within the unit.

input-power-alert-max-threshold.description: The maximum Rx alert threshold in Channel of transceiver.

input-power-critical-max-threshold.description: The maximum Rx critical threshold in Channel of transceiver.

input-power-critical-min-threshold.description: The minimum Rx critical threshold in Channel of transceiver.

tcam-utilization.description: This container defines TCAM Utilization information.

state.description: This container defines TCAM Utilization information Operational    states.

warning-threshold-level.description: Warning TCAM threshold level in percentage. Value of -1 means the field is not applicable.

critical-alert-threshold-level.description: Alert TCAM threshold level in percentage. Value of -1 means the field is not applicable.

filter-groups.description: This container defines TCAM Utilization filter-groups information.

group-id.description: A unique number corresponding to each TCAM group. This attribute is used solely for defining the key for the TCAM utilization filter groups object list. It's value shouldn't be interpreted.

state.description: This container defines filter-group information Operational states.

group-id.description: A unique number corresponding to each TCAM group. This attribute is used solely for defining the key for the TCAM utilization filter groups object list. It's value shouldn't be interpreted.

free-entries.description: Count of free entries in the TCAM group. Value of -1 means the field is not applicable.

used-entries.description: Percentage of entries used in the TCAM group.Value of -1 means the field is not applicable.

used-percentage.description: Percentage of entries used in the TCAM group. Value of -1 means the field is not applicable.

total-entries.description: Count of total entries in the TCAM group.Total is summation of dedicated entries and shared entries.Value of -1 means the field is not applicable.

dedicated-entries.description: Count of total entries dedicated to TCAM group. Dedicated entries are fixed to the TCAM group and are the minimum guaranteed number. Value of -1 means the field is not applicable.

shared-entries.description: Count of entries which are shared across TCAM groups. Value of -1 means the field is not applicable.
